pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fermi Large Area Telescope Catalogs // Data from various catalogs of astrophysical gamma-ray sources detected by NASA's Large Area Telescope (The Astrophysical Journal, 697, 1071, 2009 June 1), on board the Fermi gamma-ray satellite. More information on Fermi and its data products is available from the Fermi Science Support Center (http://fermi.gsfc.nasa.gov/ssc/).
